nodes.text: Holomonsters were animated holographic representations of creatures, both actual and mythical, that were used as playing pieces in the strategy game of dejarik. Creatures represented as holomonsters included the Ghhhk, the Houjix, the Kintan strider, the K'lor'slug, the Mantellian Savrip, the Molator, the Monnok, and the Ng'ok.
